text: @johncardillo @realDonaldTrump Fauci said on January 21, 2020 onnNewsmax that Americans had no cause for worry!  Now he blames Pres Trump? President shut down travel from China shortly thereafter Enough of the scientists Lets get back to work, carefully #DrFauvi #coronavirus  #OPENAMERICANOW
